text:
Here’s tonight’s performance of Paradise for @GlblCtzn’s Global Goal concert to combat the disproportionate impact of COVID-19 on communities of colour. Filmed and produced by @ImpossibleBrief. 
#Equality #GlobalGoalUnite https://t.co/tHQnYQFf4a

entity.name: Global Citizen: Unite For Our Future
entity.description: No one is safe until everyone is safe. Join Global Citizen, the European Commission, Miley Cyrus, Justin Bieber, and many more to Unite for our Future! Call on world leaders, corporations, and philanthropists to help fund COVID-19 tests, treatments, and vaccines to ensure no one is left behind in this pandemic. #GlobalGoalUnite

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Musician
domain.description: A musician in the world, like Adele or Bob Dylan
